${ModID}:AmalgamateWaters.NAME: Amalgamate Waters
${ModID}:AmalgamateWaters.DESCRIPTION: This gains all ${ModID}:Mutable effects from any number of cards in your hand, then ${ModID}:Transmutes them.

${ModID}:CrystalLattice.NAME: Crystal Lattice
${ModID}:CrystalLattice.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Transmute a card. Add 2 additional copies of the new card to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CrystalResonance.NAME: Crystal Resonance
${ModID}:CrystalResonance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Transmute a card, the new card is Upgraded.

${ModID}:FrozenCapsule.NAME: Frozen Capsule
${ModID}:FrozenCapsule.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutable: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Mutable: When ${ModID}:Transmuted, draw a card.
${ModID}:FrozenCapsule.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Mutable: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Mutable: When ${ModID}:Transmuted, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:GhostlyMist.NAME: Ghostly Mist
${ModID}:GhostlyMist.DESCRIPTION: When ${ModID}:Transmuted, the new card gains !M! extra damage and Block. NL ${ModID}:Mutable: ${ModID}:Transmute this card.

${ModID}:GlacialSynthesis.NAME: Glacial Synthesis
${ModID}:GlacialSynthesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ${ModID}:Transmute up to !M! cards.

${ModID}:SearingSynthesis.NAME: Searing Synthesis
${ModID}:SearingSynthesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Transmute up to !M! cards.

${ModID}:DimensionalIcicles.NAME: Dimensional Icicles
${ModID}:DimensionalIcicles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !B! times. The number of hits is affected by Block modifiers.
